[`Keymap`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Keymap.md) â€º [`popScope`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Keymap/popScope.md)

## Keymap.popScope() method

Remove a scope from the scope stack. If the given scope is active, the next scope in the stack will be made active.

**Signature:**

```typescript
popScope(scope: Scope): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>scope</code> | [`Scope`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/KeymapEventHandler/scope.md) |  |

**Returns:**

`void`
